protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for the chemotactic and inflammatory peptide anaphylatoxin C5a. This receptor stimulates chemotaxis, granule enzyme release and superoxide anion production

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Boulay F, Mery L, Tardif M, Brouchon L, Vignais P: Expression cloning of a receptor for C5a anaphylatoxin on differentiated HL-60 cells. Biochemistry. 1991 Mar 26;30(12):2993-9.
